none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on November 16, 2017 Description from Terminal Escape:
I've fawned over these kids in these pages before, and feel fortunate to have shared a split release with them a few years back. The recent release of XRDM's Fashkodato! EP (which is an absolute stunner) inspired me to spend some time with their earlier releases....and so here you go. Self titled 2014 cassette contains six blistering fastcore tracks in six minutes, with little bursts of heavy '90s crust and everything fronted by Nzt's relentless high end vocal attack. Power and speed and intensity - I really want to go back to Kota Kinabalu.... XRDM
https://xrdm.bandcamp.com/ https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-R1PBMIAnbw0/Wg2hhBi1thI/AAAAAAAAR_0/mYT1hGUdNQ8Vv4Bvz_AcfsJN-jHM6n5ggCLcBGAs/s1600/XRDM%2Bspine.jpg

seo.title: XRDM - XRDM cassette EP 2017 - Terminal Escape
